channel.title: Gigantour - COB comes back to America!
channel.description:
17 Jan 2008 - Children Of Bodom @ Gigantour 2008 Children Of Bodom will join Gigantour North America 2008 this spring together with MEGADETH, IN FLAMES, JOB FOR A COWBOY and HIGH ON FIRE. Check out the tour dates here. Presales for Gigantour started on January 16. Tickets to most of the shows are available here: Ticketmaster For Worcester, MA: Click here For Quebec City; QC: Click here For Montreal, QC: Click here For London, ON: Click here The password for ALL of the presales is SLEEPWALKER. CHILDREN OF BODOM ON THE ROAD.. 2008: 31.01. - Spinefeast At Sea 2008 (FIN) 08.03. - Astoria, London (UK) (Support: Kiuas & Moonsorrow) SOLD OUT! GIGANTOUR (with MEGADETH, IN FLAMES, JOB FOR A COWBOY and HIGH ON FIRE) Tickets to most of the shows are available here: Ticketmaster (Presales links for Worcester, Quebec, Montreal and London can be found in the list below.) Apr. 12 - Denver, CO - The Fillmore Auditorium (USA) Apr. 13 - Albuquerque, NM - Journal Pavilion (USA) Apr. 15 - Dallas, TX - Nokia Theatre Grand Prairie (USA) Apr. 16 - Corpus Christi, TX - The Pavilion @ Concrete Street (USA) Apr. 17 - Houston, TX - Verizon Wireless Theatre (USA) Apr. 19 - Louisville, KY - Louisville Gardens (USA) Apr. 20 - Atlanta, GA - Tabernacle (USA) Apr. 22 - New York City, NY - Hammerstein Ballroom (USA) Apr. 24 - Worcester, MA - The Palladium Downstairs (USA) Get tickets here Apr. 26 - Baltimore, MD - Merriweather Post Pavilion (USA) Apr. 28 - Quebec, QC - Pavilion De La Jeunesse (CAN) Get tickets here Apr. 29 - Montreal, QC - Bell Centre (CAN) Get tickets here Apr. 30 - Toronto, ON - Arrow Hall (CAN) May 01 - London, ON - John Labatt Centre (USA) Get tickets here [b]May 03 - Detroit, MI - DTE Energy Music Theatre (USA)[/b] May 04 - Cleveland, OH - Time Warner Cable Amphitheater (USA) May 06 - Chicago, IL - Aragon Ballroom (USA) May 07 - Milwaukee, WI - Eagles Ballroom (USA) May 09 - Minneapolis, MN - Myth (USA) May 10 - Winnipeg, MB - Winnipeg Convention Centre (CAN) May 11 - Saskatoon, SK - Saskatoon Prairieland Exhibition (CAN) May 12 - Edmonton, AB - Shaw Conference Centre (CAN) May 14 - Calgary, AB - Calgary Corral (CAN) May 16 - Vancouver, BC - Pacific Coliseum (CAN) May 17 - Salem, OR - Salem Armory Auditorium (USA) May 19 - San Jose, CA - San Jose Events Center (USA) May 20 - San Diego, CA - Cox Arena (USA) May 21 - Los Angeles, CA - Long Beach Arena (USA) May 22 - Phoenix, AZ - Mesa Amphitheatre (USA) FESTIVALS 31.07.-02.08. - Wacken Open Air, Wacken (GER)
I'm definitely planning to attend the Detroit, MI one. I don't really care for the other bands, just COB :P.

item.title: Gigantour - COB comes back to America!

item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

I’m pretty sure you can start buying them now from the megadeth website(you gotta register)

item.title: Gigantour - COB comes back to America!
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“ThatOneServer, post:6, topic:174583”]I’ve been waiting for this. I found out about it right when megadeth posted a bulletin on myspace(yes, i added megadeth. Just so i could put them next to tom in my top)

They’re playing 15 mins away from my house at long beach arena[/quote]
Any idea when tickets start going on sale? This’ll sell out fast!

Read full topic

item.title: Gigantour - COB comes back to America!
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Monster Hack, post:4, topic:174583”]Lame. If they don’t want to go, just go by yourself. I’ve done it once or twice, met a whole shit load of people and had a lot of fun.

-Mh[/quote]
I would, it’d just be hard to convince my parents.

17 Jan 2008 - Children Of Bodom @ Gigantour 2008

Children Of Bodom will join Gigantour North America 2008 this spring together with MEGADETH, IN FLAMES, JOB FOR A COWBOY and HIGH ON FIRE. Check out the tour dates here.

Presales for Gigantour started on January 16. Tickets to most of the shows are available here: Ticketmaster

For Worcester, MA: Click here
For Quebec City; QC: Click here
For Montreal, QC: Click here
For London, ON: Click here

The password for ALL of the presales is SLEEPWALKER.

CHILDREN OF BODOM ON THE ROAD..

2008:

08.03. - Astoria, London (UK)
(Support: Kiuas & Moonsorrow)
SOLD OUT!

GIGANTOUR
(with MEGADETH, IN FLAMES, JOB FOR A COWBOY and HIGH ON FIRE)

(Presales links for Worcester, Quebec, Montreal and London can be found in the list below.)
